title: Steve Jobs' deadly speech.
subtitle: Steve Jobs didn't leave behind a warning on his deathbed that "unstoppable pursuit of wealth" would turn a person into a twisted creature just like me.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Steve Jobs, the co-founder of Apple, left behind an article on his deathbed about how "unstoppable pursuit of wealth" would turn a person into a crooked being just like me.
